comment: Really listens to students, Lahanas's test answers are ALL in the lectures and on the e-book. Attendance is counted for points, group presentations and participation as well. Final exam was open laptop/phone/notes etc you name it.
I had her for an 8am and she was awesome! Turned out MWF into only a MW! I would deff take her if you can! Super easy, and helpful.

Professor Lahanas was really chill. We did a lot of group activity and class was interesting. Study, but you don't have to over do it. She let us bring a cheat sheet on all but one test. One group presentation that I didn't love, but overall the class was good.
This class was baby food, Lahanas is the goat
Ms. Lahanas is just an amazing teacher overall. She kept the course interesting, while making the material we learned very easy. By far my favorite teacher of this semester!

Prof. Lahanas is an extremely caring professor who is very open to adapting the course to the students. She listens to feedback on assignments and is clear about necessary assignments. She offers various extra credit opportunities and makes sure students are prepared for exams. Lectures are very interesting and she is very humorous.

Love her! I take her MWF 8 am class and she cancelled all our Friday 8 ams. Textbook is online. Great teacher she makes the class and discussions interesting. Tests aren't bad as long as you read. Some tests we got to use notes. Would definitely recommend
She is the best teacher. Its an easy A if you look over the textbook and her power points. TAKE HER! Tests are easy too.

She's a great teacher! The classroom environment is very easy. She offers great study guides for tests. As long as you pay attention and study you'll do fine in this class. Offers surprises, test wise, so just take the class to find out what they are!

This class was very interesting. Professor Lahanas is very kind and cares about her students. She makes the lectures very interesting. She does not give lots of homework and she also gives you chances for extra credit.
A lot of quizzes, complex vocab and quizzes that want the PRECISE answer and not an abbreviated sentence. With the grades so far theres no way I can pass this class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Excellent professor for Public Speaking. She gives you all the info you need to do well on your speeches--just pay attention and to exactly what you go over in class and you'll get an A. Guys, wear a tie for bonus points on speeches. I had her for a long (3 hour) one-day-a-week class, and we never stayed the whole time. Likes to finish and get out.

She is a nice,funny professor. She takes attendance but hardly ever keeps you in class the whole time. The material is fairly simple, but this class is a lot of work. She tends to grade rather strict but offers extra credit. I would take her again.

Totally awful! Does not explain how she grades, counts off on group grades for things your partners did wrong, and marks answers wrong if the book has the sentence a different way. DO NOT TAKE HER. She told me I had an A when I told her I was concerned about my grade and later found out it was really a B she just didn't want me to go to admin.
